title: Gateway
subtitle: The Web3 Professional Network
titleDescription: Where talent take ownership of their work and professional growth.

forUsers.secondaryTitle: Do work, receive recognition from the community, and strengthen your professional identity.

features.title: Join DAOs
features.description: Discover and build with the best communities across web3.

features.title: Earn Credentials
features.description: Receive verified credentials that serve as attestations for your work and your abilities.

features.title: Showcase Your Achievements
features.description: Proudly display your accomplishments across web3 on your Gateway profile.

features.title: Own Your Network
features.description: Gateway allows professionals to take ownership and meet new builders in the space.

forOrganizations.mainTitle: Built for Organizations, DAOs and Web3 Companies
forOrganizations.secondaryTitle: A new way for communities to engage their members and recognize their talents.

features.title: Own Your Spaces
features.description: Spaces created are unique to communities and managed by admins and team leads.

features.title: Create Gates
features.description: Modular quests that allow teams to actively challenge, reward, and build their community.

features.title: Issue Crendentials
features.description: Recognize core contributors for their excellence in a publicly verifiable manner.

features.title: Find Talent
features.description: Gateway’s social graph highlights the best talent for your hiring needs.

features.title: User Sovereignty
features.description: Credentials issued on Gateway are fully controlled by users, including visibility and retention.

features.title: Secure
features.description: Verified Credentials require cryptographic signatures, are easily traceable, and revocable by issuer.

features.title: Composable
features.description: Minting on Gateway is blockchain agnostic, just like your work!

buildAppsContent.title: Build apps with Web3 data
buildAppsContent.description: Gateway's decentralized credential registry allows DAOs, web3 service providers, and tools to easily issue and curate verified credentials.

features.title: Consumer
features.description: Gateway's credentials can be used by talent, organizations, and even Dapps for custom use-cases.

features.title: Credential SDK
features.description: Gateway's SDK is the powerhouse for web3 credentials. Allowing you to issue, index, curate, and handle data for the future of professional identity.

features.title: Data-Partners
features.description: Every engine needs it's fuel. Gateway's data partners support  an open-source and composable network of models.

scheduleDemoContent.title: See how Gateway can help your DAO

footerContent.receiveNews: Receive news about developments and updates.
